hero.title: Sri Harivyas Nikunja Mandir
hero.subtitle: A Sacred Place of Nimbarka Sampradaya
hero.description: Experience divine love and devotion through the teachings of Nimbarka Sampradaya

about.title: About Nimbarka Sampradaya
about.description: Nimbarka Sampradaya is one of the four Vaishnava sampradayas, founded by Nimbarkacharya. It emphasizes the philosophy of Dvaitadvaita (dualistic non-dualism) and devotion to Radha-Krishna.
about.missionText: To spread the divine teachings of Nimbarka Sampradaya and foster spiritual growth through devotion, service, and community.
